{% extends 'WebProfilerBundle:Profiler:layout.html.twig' %}

{% block toolbar %}
    {% set icon %}
        <img width="28" height="28" alt="Ladybug" style="vertical-align: middle; margin-right: 5px;" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
    {% endset %}
    {% set text %}
        <div class="sf-toolbar-info-piece">
            <b>Statsd</b>
            <span>{{ collector.operations }}</span>
        </div>
    {% endset %}
    {% include 'WebProfilerBundle:Profiler:toolbar_item.html.twig' with { 'link': true } %}
{% endblock %}

{% block head %}
    {{ parent() }}
{% endblock %}

{% block menu %}
<span class="label">
    <span class="icon">{% spaceless %}
    <img src="data:image/png;base64," style="padding-top:5px;" alt="Dependency Injection Container" />
    {% endspaceless %}</span>
    <strong>Statsd</strong>
    <span class="count">
        <span>{{ collector.operations }}</span>
    </span>
</span>
{% endblock %}

{% block panel %}
    <h2>Statsd</h2>
    {% for clientInfo in collector.clients %}
        Client : {{ clientInfo.name }}<br />
        <table class="routing inline">
            <tr>
                <th>Server</th>
                <th>Node</th>
                <th>Value</th>
                <th>Sample</th>
                <th>Unit</th>
            </tr>
            {% for operation in clientInfo.operations %}
            <tr>
                <td>{{ operation.server }}</td>
                <td>{{ operation.node }}</td>
                <td>{{ operation.value }}</td>
                <td>{{ operation.sample }}</td>
                <td>{{ operation.unit }}</td>
            </tr>
            {% endfor %}
        </table>
    {% endfor %}
{% endblock %}
